item.title: Breaking changes in BgService Logging 7.0.3
item.description: Quick access ExternalScopeLoggerProvider Use ExternalScopeLoggerProvider to share scopes The abstract class LoggerProvider should no longer inherit the interface ISupportExternalScope but use the ExternalScopeLoggerProvider instead.
